name: layer0
description: Layer 0 starter kit with Better Auth

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && pnpm dev" "cd frontend && pnpm dev"
scripts.build: cd backend && pnpm build && cd ../frontend && pnpm build
scripts.install:all: cd backend && pnpm install && cd ../frontend && pnpm install
scripts.type-check: cd backend && npx tsc --noEmit && cd ../frontend && npx tsc --noEmit
